verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In the Name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spririt. Amen

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Almighty ever living God, Maker of Heaven and Earth, we thank You for the gift of our beautiful country Kenya.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thank you for the benefit you have bestowed on each and every Kenyan. Risen Lord, the first gift you shared

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: with your disciples immediately after ressurrection was the gift of peace. They were struck with fear.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Our country is going through a similar experience not knowing who will be killed next.We are praying that You

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: may continue to protect us King of Glory. We condemn the ongoing acts of terrorism in Your Holy Name.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Lord Jesus, we have no intention to take revenge against our enemies because we know and believe that you are

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
always there for and with us.
Let these enemies of peace not defeat you King of peace. We pray for our political

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: leaders both in Government and in Opposition that as they execute their people given mandate and exercise

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: the democratic right to speak, may they never forget that they are because we are.

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: We ask this through Christ our Lord. Amen.

verse.name: v14
verse.lines:
Glory be to the Father.....
Mary Queen of Peace - pray for us.
